capabilities.name: Communicate Effectively
capabilities.description: Requires strong written and verbal communication skills for handling enquiries and collaborating with stakeholders.

capabilities.name: Commit to Customer Service
capabilities.description: Necessitates a professional and responsive approach to customer service, addressing a wide range of enquiries.

capabilities.name: Work Collaboratively
capabilities.description: Essential for building relationships and working effectively with both internal and external stakeholders.

capabilities.name: Plan and Prioritise
capabilities.description: Critical for managing competing demands and ensuring timely and efficient administrative support.

capabilities.name: Finance
capabilities.description: Understanding of budgeting, purchasing, financial processes, and reports is required.

capabilities.name: Technology
capabilities.description: Ability to learn and use multiple software systems is necessary for the role.

capabilities.name: Procurement and Contract Management
capabilities.description: Involves procurement and fleet management tasks.

capabilities.name: Manage Self
capabilities.description: Requires a proactive mindset and the ability to work effectively in a fast-paced environment.

skills.name: Administrative Skills
skills.description: Essential for managing office tasks, records, and staff rostering.

skills.name: Financial Reporting
skills.description: Necessary for budget review and financial reporting tasks.

skills.name: Software Proficiency
skills.description: Important for assisting staff with technology and managing multiple software systems.

skills.name: Team Management
skills.description: Required for managing and rostering a small team of administrative staff.

generalRole.title: Administrative Support in Environmental Conservation
generalRole.description: This role involves providing essential administrative, financial, and technological support within an environmental conservation context, ensuring the smooth operation of the National Parks and Wildlife Service's area office.
